mainText: His famous address at Stanford University's commencement has to be one of the most touching, uplifting and inspiring speeches ever given, and remains my personal favorite.  I hope his family as well as those closest to him are comforted by the knowledge that his genius will continue to influence and inspire people for generations to come.  It's been a long battle; may he rest in peace.
header: The world will miss Steve Jobs
author: Carla
